divs: Sighting Detailsi can see a circle faintly in the sky its spinning round hovering flashing blue red and green it has been hovering for the last half an hour and still doing so i have recorded it and rewinded the tape back to watch it its soo wierd its like skipping and bouncing it is still there but is moving up.
